comment: Please listen to me, I am a White American Woman that's a registered Republican, who voted for Trump. I own guns. I support free speech, I pay to be on Gab. I fought porn spammers, I fought obscene violent anime child porn posters. My birth name is Christina. I love my Country and you my Volk. Please stop hating "Nazis", we are not your enemies. You must listen to us. Antifa are Communists, far left. Antifa stands for Anti-Fascist. Nazis are Fascists, far right. Nazis arrested Socialists, Democratic Socialists, Communists and Anarchists.
amr:
# ::snt Please listen to me, I am a White American Woman that's a registered Republican, who voted for Trump. I own guns. I support free speech, I pay to be on Gab. I fought porn spammers, I fought obscene violent anime child porn posters. My birth name is Christina. I love my Country and you my Volk. Please stop hating "Nazis", we are not your enemies. You must listen to us. Antifa are Communists, far left. Antifa stands for Anti-Fascist. Nazis are Fascists, far right. Nazis arrested Socialists, Democratic Socialists, Communists and Anarchists.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l / listen-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (ii / i))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (w / woman
                  :ARG1-of (w2 / white-02)
                  :mod (c / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "America"))
                  :ARG0-of (v / vote-01

                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Trump")))
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (p2 / political-party
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Republican"
                                    :op2 "Party"))))
            :op2 (p3 / political-party
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "Fascism")
                  :domain (p4 / person
                        :mod (p5 / political-movement
                              :name (n5 / name
                                    :op1 "Antifa"))))
            :op3 (p6 / political-party
                  :name (n6 / name
                        :op1 "Republican"
                        :op2 "Party")
                  :ARG1-of (r / register-02))
            :op4 (p7 / person
                  :mod (p8 / political-party
                        :name (n7 / name
                              :op1 "Socialist"
                              :op2 "Party")))
            :op5 (p9 / political-party
                  :name (n8 / name
                        :op1 "Democratic"
                        :op2 "Party"))
            :op6 (p10 / person
                  :mod (p11 / political-movement
                        :name (n9 / name
                              :op1 "Communist"
                              :op2 "Party")))
            :op7 (p12 / person
                  :mod (a2 / anarchy)))
      :snt3 (p13 / pay-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG3 (p14 / publication
                  :name (n10 / name
                        :op1 "Gab")))
      :snt4 (n11 / name
            :op1 "Christina")
      :domain (ii3 / i)
      :snt5 (a3 / and
            :op1 (l2 / love-01
                  :ARG0 ii3
                  :ARG1 c
                  :poss ii3))
      :op2 (l3 / love-01
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (v2 / Volk))
      :snt6 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG1 (y3 / you
                  :ARG2 (l4 / listen-01
                        :ARG1 (w3 / we))
                  :ARG0-of l4
                  :snt7 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (p15 / person
                              :mod p11
                              :name n11
                              :op1 "Fascism"))
                  :domain (p16 / political-movement
                        :op2 "Nazism")))
      :op3 (p17 / political-movement
            :name (n12 / name
                  :op1 "Fascism"))
      :op4 (r2 / right-08
            :mod (f / far)))

comment: Nice "I am a proud American Trump supporter that owns guns" introduction. You might as well just say you're an American Zionist.
amr:
# ::snt Nice "I am a proud American Trump supporter that owns guns" introduction. You might as well just say you're an American Zionist.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / introduce-02
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (s / support-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Trump")))
                  :mod (c / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "America"))
                  :ARG0-of (p3 / pride-01)
                  :ARG0-of (o / own-01
                        :ARG1 (g / gun)))
            :ARG1-of (n3 / nice-01))
      :snt2 (p4 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / say-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (p5 / person
                        :mod c
                        :mod (p6 / political-movement
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Zionism"))
                        :domain y)
                  :mod (j / just))
            :mod (a / as-well)))
